description.fr: {%FightTurnStartedMonsters} Ajoute une {Spell:182001} à votre main\vsi votre héros a {value:v}\_Bouftous autour\_ de lui.
description.en: {%FightTurnStartedMonsters} Adds one {Spell:182001} spell to your hand\vif your hero has {value:v}\_{v, plural, one[Gobball] other[Gobballs]} around\_ them.
description.es: {%FightTurnStartedMonsters} Añade una {Spell:182001} a tu mano\vsi tu héroe tiene {value:v}\_jalatós alrededor\_ de él.
description.de: {%FightTurnStartedMonsters} Fügt deiner Hand einmal {Spell:182001} hinzu\v, wenn sich {value:v}\_Fresssäcke ringsum\_ deines Helden befinden.
description.pt: {%FightTurnStartedMonsters} Adiciona {Spell:182001} à sua mão\vse seu herói tiver {value:v}\_Papatudos em\_volta\_ dele.
